short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension helps you track your time spent using the web for work.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Keep track of your time spent on your web projects with the tool you use most, your browser. The Web Time Tracker makes it easy to track your hours spent on projects right inside Google Chrome.  It syncs across all your browsers so you are always up to date.  Plus, you can add goals and stay on top of your to-do list.
